summary: Eun-A lost her family at the hands of a serial killer. She is now mentally and physically destroyed. She then decides to get revenge by enlists the help of four people from different life to fulfill her revenge.
cast: Hak-rak Choi|Jo Han-Chul|In-gi Jeong|Shin Jeong-geun|Jeong-ha|Hyeon-soo Kim|Jina Kim|Seon-a Kim|Dong-seok Ma|Joo-Wan On|Hyo-ju Park
title: Deo pa-i-beu
